website_summaries.verdict: A silky, shiny, affordable lip gloss in a broad range of colors.
pros: Not just makeup: it also softens and conditions
NYX also makes complementary products, including lip liner and lipstick
cons: Although the company provides some guidance with matching skin tone, you may have to experiment with several shades to find your perfect hues

customer_reviews.title: It’s poppin
customer_reviews.text: Been obsessed with this lipgloss for 3 years now it’s a staple in my purse
customer_reviews.author: All Natural G

customer_reviews.title: Make the Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I have very sensitive lips. They breakout and dry out on the edges if I try anything "cheap", so I was skeptical on purchasing this gloss. It's more pink than it looks in the pic, but it's SO buttery and pretty! My husband and I both think it smells like cookies LOL. It goes with anything I wear and feels moisturizing; my new FAVORITE!! Spend the $3, you won't regret it!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Julian

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I was on the search for the perfect colored lip product to suit my skin/hair/and eye colors without looking like a clown. I purchased tiramisu and it's just lovely! The formula is sticky so if that bothers you I'd stay away! Also it came sealed in plastic! I'm extremely fair skinned with cool undertone, reddish blondish hair, and blue eyes it suited me very well!
customer_reviews.author: Ambern05

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My new fave lip gloss! This color (Tiramisu) and Creme Brulee are my faves. UPDATE: I've been onto these NYX butter glosses for a little over a year now. Ulta and Target are always sold out of the better colors, so Amazon to the rescue! I tried Merengue for the first time (Creme Brulee is my go to) and I really love it. Sharing an unedited unfiltered pic so you can see the color payoff on my fair skin and blonde hair combo.
customer_reviews.author: T in AL

customer_reviews.title: Great product as I use it when I am doing ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product as I use it when I am doing my custom color lipstick. It gives whatever I choose a nice finish as it is not too bright or light. The shade is just right for me.
customer_reviews.author: Oyanish

customer_reviews.title: Skip the Expensive Mall Store Buy This
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those drug store products that lives up to its reputation. It’s a nice, rose mauve color with no yellow undertones. The color stays true and won’t turn orange while you’re wearing it. It’s not sticky, like so many inexpensive lip glosses. It will also keep your lips reasonably hydrated. The color won’t be dramatic enough for some, but as an..ahem...mature woman I need to keep it subtle. This gloss is all you need for every day wear.
customer_reviews.author: Toomanycats

customer_reviews.title: Great light color on its own or as a brightening ...
customer_reviews.text: Great light color on its own or as a brightening layer on top of lipstick. Pic is creme brulee by itself.
customer_reviews.author: JCR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all skin tones
customer_reviews.text: I love this color on me. I love wearing lip gloss I have so many colors especially from NYX cosmetics, but ginger snap is my absolute favorite. This lip gloss on nice and smooth and leaves my lips feeling moisturized and color lasts on my lips all day I also love the way that it smells. The lip gloss does not have a sticky feel. This color can go well with any skin tone. I am african american with dark complexion and when I wear this color it gives more of a nude color, goes perfect with my skin complexion.
customer_reviews.author: Tosha

customer_reviews.title: IS IT WORTH IT..??
customer_reviews.text: ITS WIRTH IT! I love this lipgloss! This is one of my favorite colors! Goes on smooth and lips feel good! One down fall is it doesn't stay on all day. It does come off when drinking or eating. It's not sticky but if it gets on your fingers or arm it sticks. So it's best just for lips. The smell is pleasent. Since I'm a black girl it matches my skin perfectly and love that it has a shine to it! I recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Shanice

customer_reviews.title: Lovely product
customer_reviews.text: Ginger snap is the best lip gloss for brown skinned women PERIODT!!! IT GOES ONE SO SMOOTHLY, the color is great and it lasts for a good while. I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Atiya Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: The perfect nude
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking a longtime for the perfect nude. I have spent over a 30 on lipglosses but this hands down beats them all. So happy to happen upon this color on Pinterest! It’s awesome
customer_reviews.author: Lolita D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfecto nude color for golden/honey/olive undertone skin!
customer_reviews.text: I love this gloss so much! It is just the perfect nude glossy lipstick, I can’t believe that looks so good con my lips! If you are tan/olive skin color, this lipstick is a must! Just gorgeous 😍
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Tejeda

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this gloss. Stays on a long time. Simple but a beauty.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product!! I read that a lot of skin tones were able to wear it from dark to light and now I’m a believer! I am fair completed and I usually have a hard time finding colors that work for me and this is one! It’s a beautiful color and lasts a long time! I only paid $2.99 for this and I think I’ll buy more to put away. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Welch

customer_reviews.title: Like wow, am I obsessed with this lip gloss!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered both Tiramisu and Angel Food Cake and I'm in love with how well they suit my skin color and how smooth and moisturizing they feel on my lips. For context, I'm someone with fair skin and neutral-to-warm undertones. Both of these shades look FANTASTIC on me and I would even go as far as saying they're as good as my Buxom lip gloss!! I think the amount of product you get is more than fair/enough for the price, and I'm so happy I found these shades on Amazon and was able to avoid paying the annoying $5 shipping fee through the Nyx app. Would definitely recommend these to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Tyra

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Feels good not too sticky smells 😍😍 match my complexion perfectly and I will b ordering more
customer_reviews.author: Casshoia

customer_reviews.title: GORGEOUS
customer_reviews.text: I love this gloss I ordered the ginger snap and I'm so glad I did. I'm fair skinned in the Winter and olive tan in the summer and I love how well it goes with my complexion. This is definitely a lip gloss that can complement many beautiful shades. I love that its opaque but buildable. There's no flavor and it doesn't last too long and it smells so sweet. I also love how the gloss is more moisturizing than sticky. Overall a GREAT purchase. In my pic I'm not wearing any makeup and it looks gorgeous! Cant wait to doll myself up and then see how it looks! Definitely a must buy
customer_reviews.author: Liza

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great color, & great price
customer_reviews.text: The product feels nice on the lips and not sticky. The quality is fantastic for the price. Angel Food Cake is a beautiful color that I think most anyone can pull off. I personally am a very pale, cool-toned blond and really like the color but the mauvey, rosey pink color would work for just about anyone. The product came sealed in plastic. The only weird thing I noticed was that the lid seemed a different shade than the bottle. I have never noticed that before with other NYX lip products I have purchased but since it was factory sealed I wasn’t too worried about it. I am very happy with my purchase and especially loved the price.
customer_reviews.author: Songbirdbutler

customer_reviews.title: Nude, shiny, shear!
customer_reviews.text: NYX is one of my favorite budget makeup brands. They live up to the hype without spending an arm and a leg. This gloss at Walmart is about $5 if not more, so it's a little cheaper here. This particular butter gloss is a nude, shiny gloss that applies shear with a hint of color. It's not sticky and has a light vanilla/cupcake scent like a lovely baked good! I swiped it on once and loved it! I'm more of a matte lip person, but I can see myself wearing this on days I want a very easy to apply lip product.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lip gloss for my birthday I have never tried this lipgloss but didn’t think anything of it when I first applied this gloss by the end of the day my lips where itchy and burning I thought it was something I had ate because I did try something new (okra) so I stop using all lip products and put some ointment on my lips in till they healed when they healed I then tried to use to lip gloss again being stupid and my lip where reacting the same way once again.
customer_reviews.author: Shanya

customer_reviews.title: Nice!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these butter glosses! They are sheer enough to where if you bought the “wrong” color for yourself, it would stick work. They are very glossy but the texture on your lips isn’t thick or sticky. It’s pretty long lasting too, would totally recommend! And great price point. Just as nice as those rip off expensive trendy lip / butter glosses.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren S

customer_reviews.title: So pretty!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not much of a “lip” person but this is a super flattering color and looks beautiful on! I love that I can throw this on when I just have a tiny bit of makeup on and it can boost my look. It’s very smooth and not sticky which I love!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this shade praline! It’s not long lasting when you drink/eat but that’s with any lip gloss. For the price you can’t complain. I recommend
customer_reviews.author: JaedaLanai

customer_reviews.title: OLD PRODUCT-DISCOLORED
customer_reviews.text: Lipgloss arrived discolored. No amount of mixing with the applicator has helped. It looks and smells old....I have purchased this product many times from Ulta and never had a problem. Will not purchase from Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Tiller

customer_reviews.title: Really good lipgloss
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one based on an article I read and I have to say it is amazing. It is so inexpensive and the quality is good. I got in several different colors and really like them. There is not bad taste to them and they are very smooth.
customer_reviews.author: MoniFed

customer_reviews.title: Dont Hestitate ....buy now and often :-)
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 'Angle Food Cake' and 'Tiramisu' (for the second time) and love them both! 'Angle Food Cake' is the darker/pinker of the two, however they are both light in color. Can be worn alone or on top of darker lipstick. They are moisturizing, glossy, definatley not sticky (I hate sticky lip gloss) they stay on pretty good, i'm surprised for lip gloss, usually i 'eat it' within minutes. Also smells yummy and has light taste. Dont Hestitate ....buy now and often :-)
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Tree Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and flattering
customer_reviews.text: This has become my 'go to' lipgloss. The color is very similar to my natural lip color but with a slightly rosy shimmery overlay. It's like a dusty rose. It is so natural that at times my husband cannot tell that I am wearing it (he hates when I wear lipgloss). I'll admit that it is very 'buttery' and glossy so a light application is advised. All in all, I love it. It's affordable and flattering. What more can I ask for? I look forward to trying other shades in this product line.
customer_reviews.author: JoFromBk

customer_reviews.title: Going to try again with a darker shade.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lip butter in Crème Brulée because of so many raving reviews of it and....well....I hate it. It's lighter than the shade of my actual lips, so I look like I'm just up off my deathbed when I wear it. Not flattering at ALL, and I'm rather surprised, considering that I'm a green-eyed blonde. I'm going to try again with a different shade.
customer_reviews.author: S. McKinney

customer_reviews.title: VERY SMALL item & NOT good lip gloss
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this lip gloss. Worst lip gloss I've ever tried, terrible color, collects at corners of your mouth after just one hour of wear. To top it off, container is ridiculously small. :(
customer_reviews.author: A Marie Thompson

customer_reviews.title: CINNAMON ROLL & RED VELVET LOOKS AS SCRUMPTIOUS AS THEY SOUND😋 😍
customer_reviews.text: Cinnamon Roll is a warm, neutral color with a pink-brownish undertone. I've been looking for a natural looking color that will compliment my lips and this is it... It's exactly what I was seeking! Red Velvet is of course, red and vibrant and also compliments my lips well. They're both very Moisturizing and provides a good amount of shine. However, they will need to be reapplied throughout the day but for the price...they're most definitely worth it. Thumbs up 👍
customer_reviews.author: Blessed

customer_reviews.title: Tiramisu is a perfect shade, almost nude with a pink tint.
customer_reviews.text: So pretty and not overly sticky. Wonderful scent. It layered nicely and lasted a couple hours.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing and great smell
customer_reviews.text: I just got home from work and my package was here as promised in one day. A YouTube blogger recommended this and once I saw her review I instantly ordered. Happy I did This lipgloss is so moisturizing and beautiful. My pictures don’t capture the color and beauty in real life. I want to try some of the the other colors now.
customer_reviews.author: EM

customer_reviews.title: Greatest lip butter on the market.
customer_reviews.text: It’s taken me almost a lifetime to find the perfect pink lippy. I adore this product. It’s glossy without being sticky, smells amazing and it’s a perfect pink for my skin tone. And all for very little cash. I’ve got $25 tubes of lipstick that will stay in the drawer because this has replaced them all. Who’d a thought such a simple lip butter was such a punch of perfection. Side note I do have to apply two coats to get the color I like but it is buildable.
customer_reviews.author: DA FugesAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Old, thin lips?! This makes them look nice, classy and subtle!
customer_reviews.text: I like the subtle creme brulee color. i can put it over lip liner and even a darker color and it blends and hides how small and blah my lips are!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Streaky
customer_reviews.text: I watched some YouTube videos to see how everyone felt about this gloss, and it was pretty much unanimous that’s it’s a thumbs up for the product; so I was sold! I loved the colors and I ordered them. The reviews on here was convincing too. So, the lighter tinted glosses applies extremely streaky and it gets worse when rubbing your lips together; BUT when you just sort of dab your lips together it kind of covers the streaks but not completely. Other then that, it smells like cake and the colors are very pretty but will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: ceaira

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe this is under five dollars. This smells great, has no taste, is moisturizing, doesn’t burn lips, and is thick enough to last for quite awhile. I’ve got dark brown hair and the lightest olive skin you can imagine and Angel Food Cake is very flattering.
customer_reviews.author: JonesTheCat

customer_reviews.title: A go to lipgloss
customer_reviews.text: This is now my go to gloss. I swatched all my gloss nudes I had at the time for a comparison chart. The NYX is definitely a fav for me and also it’s seems so good I could eat it. All u need to do is line ur lips with a light to medium brown liner depending on ur skin tone and just apply the gloss. Your welcome
customer_reviews.author: zee

customer_reviews.title: the best brown lipgloss of all time
customer_reviews.text: i first found this gloss while on vacation with my friends, and i lost it. i was so determined to have it back i have ordered severl replacements so i dont have to run out or misplace one again. smooth creamy texture without being sticky and a heavenly scent with its subtle lip stain, keeps me coming back for more
customer_reviews.author: Mya

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this lipgloss already!!!Just received it today and I’m in love ❤️Wheeeew chillllle the color!!!! It's soooo pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Destanee S

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: The Ginger Snap Lip Gloss is exactly what I wanted. It's a bit of color and shine, not too much. It's enough color that I don't need to use lipstick. I have to be careful not to use too much because it can get too dark very easily. I'm in my 60s; if I were younger I might want more shine or a darker color, which would be easy to achieve with this. The Prestige Lip Liner in Mocha works very well with it.
customer_reviews.author: L K

customer_reviews.title: Creamy and glossy goodness.
customer_reviews.text: My wife has a yellow undertone, medium skin coloring and she says this is the perfect MLBB shade for her. It applies creamy, glossy and opaque but is not long lasting. It is kind of moisturizing on the lips, especially during harsh winters. It has to applied frequently throughout the day because it wears off if food or drink is consumed.
customer_reviews.author: Pooja

customer_reviews.title: Best lipgloss ever!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this lipgloss! It is a smooth, thin consistency and does not have an overwhelming plastic taste. This glides on smoothly and is not sticky at all but it will not stay on all day due to this consistency. I do not mind this as I prefer a thin lipgloss to a sticky one. For years I have been looking for a replacement to Mary Kay’s almond glaze and Bit of Honey is by far the closest I have found. I think I may begin hoarding this color as it gives me a healthy and fresh glow.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: LIES!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The tiramisu color I received was NOT tiramisu. The cap is but the color is NOT! I use the tiramisu color all the time and this is an ugly bright pink. Bologna.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this lipgloss and I already love it! I’m fair skin and the tiramisu color was the best color for me. The Angel Cake also worked but it’s a little more red with a bluish undertone so it didn’t work for me. I love that the size is smaller than a regular size lipgloss bc I can easily fit it anywhere. I will order more for sure!
customer_reviews.author: NBG

customer_reviews.title: Ginger Snap / Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Ginger snap is a beautiful color. It scented and I'm sensitive but I wasn't allergic. It is a nice scent. It is a gloss, so don't expect staying power.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Adorable color, but slips right off lips.
customer_reviews.text: This was a waste of money. While it does moisturize while it's on, it doesn't stay on very long. It kind of just "slips" off the lips. Like within minutes of putting it on. It would be a mess when eating or drinking. I would not recommend this product as is and I definitely won't be purchasing this brand again. I would have sent back the second color if I hadn't opened both. {I ordered 2 different colors because of all the good reviews}. Skip this product and just get some good lipstick and Avene lip product for moisturizer instead. More expensive, but at least it will stay on your lips.
customer_reviews.author: Passing Through

customer_reviews.title: Updated review: Peaches and Cream, Devil's Food cake
customer_reviews.text: I bought Angel Food Cake and it's a boring blah nudish drab shade. I thought it would be more pink or rose. I'm Returning this mistake and getting a more vibrant shade. Update 1/29/20: bought Peaches and Cream which is a pretty, very springtime pink coral color, more pink than coral on my lips, I love it. Also bought Devil's Food Cake which I returned bc it looks brown on my lips, not very attractive!!!
customer_reviews.author: Conicki

customer_reviews.title: satisfied
customer_reviews.text: its a really pretty brown gloss. ive been looking for one to go over some brown liner and this is perfect. smells good, feels good and was 3 bucks. doesnt last longer than an hour though. it is buildable coverage.
customer_reviews.author: aari.

customer_reviews.title: Smells good 👍
customer_reviews.text: So I bought Tiramisu. I'm very pale with cool undertones. My lips are also a little uneven so I lined them first with "Believe Beauty in the color of Barely There" perfect match for Tiramisu. I like the gloss it's a good go to. Tastes and smells nice and last a decent amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy cheek

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Moisturizing!
customer_reviews.text: A little goes a long way with this product and the color is so flattering! I got the shade Peaches & Cream and it really accentuates my natural lip color, but better. This gloss is going to last a long time and is affordable which is great? As a personal preference I don't think it should be used for the purpose of a lip balm, but for being a gloss it is really nice. The product is not sticky. :)
customer_reviews.author: Dolores

customer_reviews.title: It's cheap. As excepted.
customer_reviews.text: Pink: So do you see the models in the pics? How this stuff looks chunky and uneven? Yea it's basically like that. It's like liquid Shae butter but it looks like you put yogurt on your lips. But you get what u paid for. Smells good. Color looks fine. But looks cheap. Red: It looks much better color wise but still has the same consistency and issues the pink one does. But it does have a nicer look that stands out.. If only it wasn't for the yogurt look
customer_reviews.author: Nny

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love this...
customer_reviews.text: This is my personal opinion after trying to wear this lippy several times. It smells delicious. Exactly like tiramisu? No. Not a lot of taste, but not unpleasant. The color on my lips is gorgeous-my lip are naturally mauve, and this enhances with pretty coverage. The sponge-ish applicator is perfect, making application simple and decently precise. I took 2 stars off because it's really sticky. If I kept my hair down, inevitably it got stuck to my lips. The other reason is that I had to constantly reapply. If I took more than one sip of coffee, I had to put more on. Not much in the moisture category, either. Hope this helps :)
customer_reviews.author: jinxiejoi

customer_reviews.title: My 'go-to" Gloss
customer_reviews.text: This has become my 'go-to' lip gloss. I am a gloss junkie and I have tried 100's of different glosses. This one tends to last longer than most and isn't sticky or too heavy. Great color choices for my particular skin tone.
customer_reviews.author: Baxter's BandB

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful nude pink color for a sophisticated, understated look
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an understated but sophisticated look for daily wear; this lip gloss more than met my expectations. Numerous acquaintances have complimented me on this new choice of lip color. Note: I have a very fair peaches-and-cream complexion (I know, I'm blushing). The gloss comes off relatively quickly, so be prepared to re-apply before walking in for that important meeting :)
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Favorite lipgloss since high school! Even after it wears off it leaves a moisturizing feeling. I got the color tiramisu and paired it with NYX suede matte lipliner in the color “free spirit”. Not sticky, lots of color options
customer_reviews.author: Annie Navarro

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product for your lips
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like this product at all and when you put it on it kind of cakes on the outside of your lips and it's hard to like blended into where it's all together and it just looks done when it tastes good and pretty color but the way it applies it just it yeah it's no good I'm actually not going to keep it so that's how much I don't like it yeah. It's just not a good product it cakes on outside your lips makes you look dumb
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: This is very nude and white sheer. I think it would look great with a nude lip liner for an ombré effect. It’s not terribly sticky, and it does feel moisturizing. I can tell it won’t last terribly long, but I’m not opposed to reapplying. Overall I do really like this product. Edit: The last picture is the lip butter gloss over a nude lip liner
customer_reviews.author: Mariash Dopey

customer_reviews.title: LOVE Tiramisu!
customer_reviews.text: The perfect color! Tiramisu is like a neutral pink color, not bright but not dark at all and with a lovely natural looking pigment that can go with any look. The formula is super moisturizing and the perfect amount of thick, I didn't find mine to be sticky like some people were saying. It applies nicely and stays for a lonnng time with the soft color. So much better than ALL my other lip glosses. 10/10 will recommend and WILL buy again!
customer_reviews.author: LorettaFlowers

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Color - Great Price - Glad I Purchased
customer_reviews.text: I've never purchased a lip gloss online before so I wasn't sure what to expect in terms of color. It was slightly darker than what I envisioned from the swatch, but still a beautiful color that I enjoy wearing daily. It's very moisturizing and doesn't immediately wear off when I'm drinking from a straw, which is nice so I don't have to continually re-apply as much. I would recommend it, especially for African-American women with medium dark skin like myself - it's a very complimentary color especially when paired with a similar tone lip liner.
customer_reviews.author: Monica L. White

customer_reviews.title: One of my all time favs!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried a lot of lip gloss over the years and this one is one of my favs. It doesn’t last if you’re eating or drinking but its smell and taste (lol!) is really good! Kind of vanilla-like? Some verrry high end brands small rank. That’s what makes this one so good and will be a return purchase for me!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel & Austin Holt

customer_reviews.title: Must have!!
customer_reviews.text: Ladies of all ages ask me all the time what I'm wearing...and I share because women empower women!! This shade is perfect..not too pink and not bright or too pale..perfect neutral nude! If you want a neutral on the pink (blush) end..Creme Brulee is my go to.. I carry both and you can't go wrong with either of these shades! The "flavor" is subtle and yummy.. not artificial, long lasting wear and you can't beat the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Like butter!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this gloss!! It seriously goes on like butter and provides buildable coverage depending on how pigmented you want it. I’ll be stocking up on these for sure!!
customer_reviews.author: Maria's Book Blog

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't wear gloss but I absolutely love this stuff! It's not too sticky and it lasts for quite a while. Definitely recommend. Oh, and I got the ginger snap kind, very neutral and natural looking :)
customer_reviews.author: Bashira

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Shade!
customer_reviews.text: Writing this from my husbands account! I have been searching high and low for a lipgloss that was Brown Girl Friendly and Glossy yet not overall sticky. Asia have tried numerous NYX lipglosses, stains, lip creams and I still struggled to find a color that worked like I wanted. Enter Praline! If you are a Brown girl like myself and you want a nude but still glossy lip gloss than Praline is DEF It!! It’s the perfect shade! I couldn’t find it anywhere in stores so amazon to the rescue as usual lol!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Big Deal✊🏿

customer_reviews.title: I love praline!
customer_reviews.text: I really love it. I use praline frequently and it seems to flatter my lips rather than make them look greasy or messy. The smell and flavor is great, the color seems to be ok, but I would recommend the seller to change the picture to show more accurate shade. The one in the picture is more pinkish, the one I received is more "reddish" if that makes sense. For flaws I would say: if it is kept in one place for long it starts to become more thick than smooth so keep use it frequently!
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: An Office-Friendly, WOC-Friendly Nude Lip Gloss!
customer_reviews.text: I'd been in the mood for nude lips lately but didn't really have that many in my arsenal of lip products. I looked up WOC friendly shades and this gloss constantly came up. I'm SOOOO glad I bought it! It's just right for the office and isn't in the "concealer nude" family. It's suble but also makes itself known. NYX Butter Glosses are the best in texture, also. So smooth and shiny. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for those who don't like sticky gloss!
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally like the feeling of gloss or lipstick, and find it impossible to find the correct shade, one that is subtle and natural, but I love the Creme Brulee Butter Gloss! It's neither sticky, nor thick, and there's no noticeable flavor or smell, which is a huge plus for me. My complexion ranges from fair in the winter to dark in the summer, and this shade compliments both and every shade in between. It's subtle with the perfect pink and peach undertones and just the right amount of shine!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: It lives up to its name, it really is a very buttery gloss. It feels very velvety upon application but you will need to apply it more than once throughout the day. Not an excessive amount though, maybe two or three times gets me through the day. It does transfer also but that's just sort of what glosses do. THE COLOUR IS STUNNING. I got the angel food cake one and it is such a pretty darker pink colour. It seems a little plum-y but I'm not sure. Dark pink just doesn't do it justice, it really is just a beautiful, velvety lip gloss!
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this gloss. The color Angel Food Cake is my favorite rosy-neutral, sort of a “my lips but better” color. Excellent moisturizing wear and shine. I like to pair it with the NYX Nude Pink lip liner pencil for an everyday pretty look, but it can be paired with other colors like my Nude, Mauve, or Rose colored lipsticks. This gloss is as good or better than ones from brands like Too Faced, Benefit, and MAC, I’ve tried them all. Excellent value and all the colors are pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Jewell

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hesitate.
customer_reviews.text: I love this lip gloss. I didn’t know what “flavor” meant on the review but it isnt strong so if it gets in your mouth it doesnt leave a bad taste. This is so easy to put on, not sticky, and very subtle. It lasts a long time- even if you dont have the rlly glossy feel- your lips still feel moisturized. Def worth the buy. Subscribe and save!
customer_reviews.author: Free. J

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price but a little goopy for my liking
customer_reviews.text: It's a mediocre product. I didn't expect very much for the price so I wasn't let down but it still could have been better. The taste brings me back to being twelve again and the aftertaste of those crappy lip glosses every 13-year-old girl got in their stocking at Christmas. It's also kind of goopy and thick. The color is nice though. So in summary, if you're okay with a gross taste in your mouth and don't mind a little goop this is the product for you.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shade
customer_reviews.text: I feel so lucky I finally found a color I’ve been looking for! Natural-ish. Any ways - it seems to last pretty long. Recently I put makeup on before a day out snowboarding and at lunch my lips weren’t dry or chapped. It was not the intention when I purchased for any thing other than an easy going color, but it seems to be pretty long lasting. Color is true, and taste is not “unpleasant” but I’ve never been one looking for fruity flavored lip coverage so the taste is not something I’ve considered.
customer_reviews.author: yea.bout.that

customer_reviews.title: New must have ?
customer_reviews.text: I think everyone who loves makeup should have some of these! Price is amazing, color is beautiful and accurate, it lasted quite a while with drinking and eating. It felt super nice and comfortable didnt feel sticky. It glided on nicely and went super well with the liner from the same brand. I think these would be great to add to your makeup collection or just to try new colors out! Comfortable, Beautiful, Great Price, Lasts quite awhile!
customer_reviews.author: BullmastiffMama22

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: I wish the color looked the same on my lips as it does in the bottle. It's more of a nude color on the lips. Almost like wearing a clear gloss. This adds no color to my lips. -creme brulee
customer_reviews.author: kateland howard

customer_reviews.title: Great! But color was a tad “off”.
customer_reviews.text: I would say that for the price, this is a good buy and you’ll enjoy it. But for this shade specifically, it is much lighter in person than it is online. So you don’t notice much when I put it on other than a little shine. But, I gave. To my sister who is lighter toned than me and it’s perfect on her.
customer_reviews.author: MandyK

customer_reviews.title: The best gloss ever
customer_reviews.text: I've tried so many different glosses. From high end glosses to dollar glosses. But, the NYX professional Butter Gloss has got to be my all time favorite. I get at least 6 hour wear from this gloss. The color payoff is very nice and natural. It really does feel like butter on your lips. Unlike a lot of other glosses, this gloss isn't sticky. And you cannot beat the price! At under $6, I Definitely will be repurchasing all the colors!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color but ...
customer_reviews.text: Made me look pale like a vampire. I'm Black and brown skinned, I'm not even that light but this color made me look a little sickly. I got the red velvet figuring it would be a pretty little pop of color but no. It just drained my color. I gave it to my sister, she likes bold colors. That being said, I do love the feel of it on my lips and will be buying another color. Maybe a deep pink color.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly M. Clayborne

customer_reviews.title: The perfect lip gloss
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. The best lip gloss ever!!! The ‘butter gloss ginger snap’ is perfect for my skin tone. The price is right too. It smells amazing, it feels good on my lips. Not tacky at all. And once applied, it last a long time. I love it so much, I purchased another. It’s always good to have a spare. This is my everyday nude lip coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Libra1018

customer_reviews.title: Buy!!️ Buy!!️ Buy!!️
customer_reviews.text: Fortune Cookie is my absolutely go to gloss!! Paired with a brown liner, this combo is bomb!! It’s not sticky and it lasts long! I buy three and four at one time!
customer_reviews.author: Kookie Dowdy

customer_reviews.title: Not color lasting
customer_reviews.text: I put this on and felt to glossy. I did not need to blot. Color matched me perfectly. However the color faded in under 15 mins. I tried it seven times. Moisture stays but not the color. To me this is only worth it as a clear lip gloss. Which thats the only way ill buy again.
customer_reviews.author: rachael simmons

customer_reviews.title: Love the lipstick but
customer_reviews.text: I really love this lipstick. The color is great, very moisturizing and smells wonderful. What I don't like about it is that it leaks. I made sure I screwed the top back tightly and when I went to use it the next day, it had leaked all over my bag. Thought it was me so again I screwed the top on tightly and again it leaked. Maybe that's why it was under $6.
customer_reviews.author: Allene

customer_reviews.title: This product really amazed me
customer_reviews.text: I'm a frequent buyer and user of various lip glosses and I'm a beauty insider at Sephora too (with a bunch of points racked up). I really wished I found this product sooner, so I wouldnt have spend so much on other products. this color is a soft pink with a high shine. When first applied I thought it would be sticky and overly shiny, but I was wrong. It literally glides on softly and is not sticky whatsoever. The gloss smells like its name, and for $6, I will be buying more colors to add to my collection. Sephora is going to miss me ;)
customer_reviews.author: Lvluvchild

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It's so good. The only thing is that the first time I wore it got on my teeth because I put too much on, but that's how much I loved applying it! This lipgloss is perfect for casual days, with professional outfits or even a night on the town, I have not had a bad experience with this. It also has a lovely balance between shiny and glossy which is something other products I've got have lacked. For the women worried about how it would blend with your skin because it's a shade of brown, put your worries to rest because this is probably the best natural shade lipgloss out there.
customer_reviews.author: Zenn

customer_reviews.title: Not my color but it could be someone else's very very moisturizing I am happy with that
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great. My issue is the color but it's hard to shop online when it comes to picking out colors. It is extremely hot pink like an 80s hot pink! But it is very moisturizing and if you like that color the product itself is Grace I will continue to buy more of this brand just not this color. I bought more than one color so I use this particular hot pink one on days where I'm wearing my mask just to moisturize my lips because I know nobody will see my 80s lip gloss LOL
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Allergic to it
customer_reviews.text: First of all I don't think it is the company's fault. However myself and other people I have read about online on Reddit have gotten blisters on their lips. I had to toss mine. I really liked it and the color was nice but the long-term effect was not. I thought it was great that it was cruelty free. Check ingredients on products to see if you might be allergic to something. Good product but not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality 👌
customer_reviews.text: First off, great value. This does live up to the "professional" claim of NYX's branding. It can't really compete with super high end luxury brands, but it's better than 90% of lip products in its price bracket. I bought the shade, Tiramisu, which looked a little warmer and more neutral in the swatch photos listed. This is definitely more purple pink than coral pink or beige pink.
customer_reviews.author: Elle Hollister

customer_reviews.title: Its use fit the description
customer_reviews.text: its nyx so its good. listen, to those who expect jelly gloss to last the whole day on them..... please be real. this is not going to do that. It will wipe off when you eat as it should. And then you reapply like a woman/ or man. but it smells like heaven, feels so nice when putting it on, you'd want to use it all up in one sitting. and..... its nyx so its good. its moisturizing for sure.
customer_reviews.author: exhiliration

customer_reviews.title: I love these glosses
customer_reviews.text: I love these glosses. The colors that I picked matched my complexion perfectly. I can't wait to order more. Don't allow the photo image to fool you. The two colors that I picked didn't really look good to me on the photo image they have on line when you want to try the color. In person they were perfect so I didn't have to return them. This was an absolute good buy. I will be purchasing more colors.
customer_reviews.author: cutie81

customer_reviews.title: Tiramisu - Name says it all...feels buttery smooth!
customer_reviews.text: Color: Tiramisu Just the subtle natural color I was looking for. Very buttery texture, not sticky at all. Seems pretty moisturizing as well. I will definitely buy more colors!
customer_reviews.author: LR

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Nice feeling. Decent wear. Only downside is the colors are not as photographed. This was quite a few shades darker than the photo and the consistency does not match that shown in the photo. But it’s a good price for a decent gloss.
customer_reviews.author: JLDS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little gloss
customer_reviews.text: Love this gloss! It’s the perfect neutral color. Adds a bit of color and shine without being glittery. Not sticky at all, It makes your lips feel smooth and moisturized. Small size is perfect to keep in my pocket at work.
customer_reviews.author: C. Haley

customer_reviews.title: Nice gloss, didn’t love the color
customer_reviews.text: This gloss made my lips feel buttery and nice, but the color didn’t work for me. It made my lips too pale. I was able to wear it over a darker lipstick.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Color deceiving from photo
customer_reviews.text: In the photo “Merengue” looks pink which is exactly what I was looking for....I just received it in the mail and it’s definitely purple. No where near the color shown. I have others from this brand that I purchased in store and love it, just wished this color was more like the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie.S

customer_reviews.title: Sticky and not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this item due to all the wonderful reviews, but I did not! First let me say the color I got is awesome and close to my natural lip color which is great. BUT man is this lip gloss STICKY as hell on your lips. Super thick feeling too while on, and definitely not kiss proof. Overall, not happy and WOULD NOT buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lama Mama

customer_reviews.title: Smooth like buttah!
customer_reviews.text: The name says it all. It really does feel like buttah! I love lip gloss but despise the sticky feeling. I put this over Maybelline super stay matte lipstick and the results are amazing. Super smooth and shiny and no sticky sensation! It's kissable!
customer_reviews.author: Kendall Forsythe

customer_reviews.title: Excatly as pictured and amazing
customer_reviews.text: Bought two different ones an LOVE them. The butter gloss smells sooo good and goes on smooth not sticky with a nice shimmery shine. Looked awesome for a simple date night look. The the darker color is more valentine’s day pinkishs and it’s matte. Drys without clumping and cracking and looks awesome one me! I love all of NXY products and would highly recommend especially if your just starting out on professional makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Williams

customer_reviews.title: Very little  color, really sticky
customer_reviews.text: What a big disappointment this was. I was really swayed by great reviews, but this did not live up to my expectations at all. There is almost no color payoff. Any color you do see at application seems to go away almost immediately. It's sticky, it doesn't stay on long, I hated it. I threw it away. (It looks really pretty in the tube, though.)
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gloss for no makeup makeup
customer_reviews.text: These little glosses are awesome! As someone who spends a ton on expensive products, these really impressed. No dryness and the color payoff is outstanding. It’s highly pigmented and very forgiving on older lips. It doesn’t travel even without liner. No flavor to speak of. I got several shades and all are flattering.
customer_reviews.author: pencilskirt

customer_reviews.title: Totally a fan!
customer_reviews.text: Very moisturizing, long lasting and it has a pleasant vanilla scent. I got the Peach and the Sorbet, both colors are vibrant and flattering. For $3, you can’t go wrong with this—highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: The best lipgloss ever!
customer_reviews.text: This lipgloss is truly my favorite lipgloss of all time! It stays on for a long time, and it doesn’t leave a film on my lips. I get a ton of compliments. The taste is great and my hubby likes the flavor when we kiss ;)
customer_reviews.author: Yashanda I.

product_meta.title: NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP Butter Gloss - Angel Food Cake, True Mauve
product_meta.description: Color:Angel Food CakeButtery soft and silky smooth, our decadent Butter Gloss is now available in sumptuous shades! Each glossy color delivers sheer to medium coverage that melts onto your lips and is never sticky, leaving your lips soft, supple and kissable.
feature_bullets: Butter gloss: Buttery soft & silky smooth, our decadent Butter Gloss is available in a wide variety of sumptuous shades Each glossy color delivers sheer to medium coverage that melts onto your lips
Kissable lips: Our best-selling Butter Gloss goes on smooth & creamy & is never sticky, leaving your lips soft, supple & kissable. Try all of our delicious shades, from Angel Food Cake to Tiramisu
Lip products for the perfect pout: Doll your lips in plush, creamy, perfection Try our complete line of lip products including lipstick, lip liner, lip gloss, lip cream, lip liner, & butter gloss
Cruelty free cosmetics: We believe animals belong in our arms—not in a lab. All of our makeup is certified & acknowledged by PETA as a cruelty-free brand. We don't test any of our products on animals

Discover NYX professional makeup: Try all of our professional makeup & beauty products today, from eyeshadow, eyeliner, mascara & false lashes to lipstick, foundation, primer, blush, bronzer, brushes & more

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
